key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities from raw material shortages and rising costs
Economic sensitivity tied to the housing market and construction industry
High competition in the composite decking market
Legal issues from class-action lawsuits regarding product durability
controversies: Class-action lawsuits consolidated into multidistrict litigation (MDL) in New Jersey over PVC decking product durability
environmental_issues: Chemical processes in composite material production could attract environmental scrutiny
social_issues: Positive employee satisfaction and recognition as a top workplace
governance_issues: Potential governance risks from legal challenges and product quality allegations
